shark.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans
shark.translation[0].definitions[0].note: shark-infested waters (=waters where there are a lot of sharks)
shark.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Sharks were circling around our boat.
shark.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who cheats other people out of money
shark.translation[0].definitions[1].note: pool/card shark (=someone who uses their skill at pool or cards to cheat other players out of money)
shark.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: someone who cheats other people out of money, especially by giving bad financial advice
shark.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Never do business with these sharks.
